snippet.title: Wizdom Academy - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
As the Headmaster, you build and manage your wizarding school your way, making meaningful strategic decisions, customizing your castle and progressing through a comprehensive tech tree. 
Wizdom Academy will be available soon on PC (via Steam).

► Follow us on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2668000?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=teaser

Social Media :

► Twitter :  https://twitter.com/WizdomGame
► TikTok :  https://www.tiktok.com/@wizdom.academy
► Instagram :  https://www.instagram.com/wizdomaca/
► Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/people/Wizdom-Academy/100094656188383/
► Website : https://www.wizdomacademy.com

#Steam #IndieGame #Building
